oracle.binding
Interface FilterableDataControl

All Known Implementing Classes:
BeanDataControl, BeanDataControl, BeanFilterableDataControl, DataFilterHandler, EjbDataControl, JavaBeanDataControl, JPQLDataFilterHandler, JPQLManagedDCHandler
public interface FilterableDataControl

For internal use only. Application developers should not use this
This interface is implemented by data controls that have capability to filter collections based on sort criteria, search criteria and/or fetch position
